This blend grows into heady mid-notes of sage and cypress, followed by spruce and bergamot top notes.Wild Fig - Wild Fig is an intricate fusion of woody and floral aromas. Reminiscent of a sun-drenched grove, hints of sweet freesia and ozone open up to sun-ripened fid surrounded by light jasmine, cherry blossom, and geranium. Notes of green leaves, bamboo, and moss add a lush, green quality balanced by shades of patchouli and saffron.

description: **This board is packaged in a mailer box with mixed blended crinkle paper, FREE of charge :)Modern Rustic Acacia wood and marble serving board. This board is personalized by laser engraving the last name and adding a special touch like the established date. ADD on matching coasters (set of 4), stand, and knives to show off your thoughtfulness. Gift this board to that special someone that deserves it! Perfect for Christmas, weddings, engagements, bridal showers, birthdays, and even housewarming gifts.Not just a statement piece in your kitchen but 100% a usable product. All-natural wood, food-grade board, stain, paint, and chemical-free. Color in wood may vary as this wood is in its most natural state and we do not modify it in any way. The board is seasoned with board oil prior to shipping. Please maintain the board with a monthly application of cutting board oil to extend the life of the board.Please select your design from the OPTION DESIGN PAGE in the listing pictures. If you are purchasing coasters please include the design option as well, otherwise, it will be assumed that you want the same font for both.PLEASE ENTER EXACTLY HOW YOU WOULD LIKE IT TO READ INCLUDING THE WORD "THE"If you are not interested in the designs that are displayed, we welcome new ideas and you can simply include it under the personalization tab.*** Ships within 1-3 business days with FREE SHIPPING INCLUDED!Dimensions:Board:*Length: 10 1/2"*Width: 7 1/2"*Height: 1/2"*Handle Length: 4 1/2""Total: Size w/ handle:15” x 7 1/2” x 1/2"Coasters:4.5" x 4"Handwash ONLYRules About Making Last Names in Plural• Apostrophes imply possession, which isn’t what you’re trying to do. You’re simply naming them in the plural.• These rules mean you should write out any last name in full and simply tack on an s at the end. For example, the last name Smith should be “The Smiths” or the last name Garcia would be “The Garcias”.• **Please also be advised that using an apostrophe BEFORE tacking on the s is NOT grammatically correct as it is showing possession. For example, the last name “Miller” should NOT be “Miller’s” but rather “Millers”. We will correct grammatical errors involving the apostrophe after the s, due to a long history of customers requesting redos once they have realized the mistake.Exceptions• If the name ends in s, z, ch, or sh, add es or  an apostrophe at the end.  That means the Morris family becomes The Morrises, or The Morris’ , the French family becomes the Frenches, the Hernandez family becomes the Hernandezes.• If the name ends in x, add es—unless the x is silent. So the Felix family becomes the Felixes, and the Bordeaux family becomes the Bordeauxs.If you cannot make up your mind, no worries, you can always NOT add the “The” and just simply engrave their last name by itself with no plural tense (it will still look AWESOME)!!Disclaimer: We will correct grammatical errors involving the apostrophe before the s, due to a long history of customers requesting re-dos once they have realized the mistake. We are not responsible for misspellings of any nature because we simply copy and paste.*Disclaimer: Not one piece of wood is identical. Please be aware that the wood color, tone, and or grains may vary.*Shipping Policy: Ships within 1-3 business days. Free ground shipping at checkout. Typically arrives within 3-7 business days after the item is shipped.*Return Policy: No refunds or returns as this is a customized gift. Please double-check for spelling or grammatical errors on the personalization line before you submit the order. Please message us via the ETSY app to report changes within 1hr of purchase. Messages are verified before laser engraving your board.
